venue.address_2: The Back Bay across from The Pru
venue.name: Brasserie Jo

item.description:
In september.....I say....If they dont have bread...let them eat cake....oops pardon my French...

Some of you who had attended the ABC nights are familiar with the concept but for the newbies .....here it is...

We live to eat not eat to live right?
Plan is to pick one restaurant from countries starting with alphabets A to Z around boston every month.....so if you are a foodie....join in ....or.... be left out...

Join us for September French Brunch...
(Please bring Cash)
item.name: Pardon my French, Brunch!
